object.name: InlineQueryResultGame
object.description:
Represents a Game.
Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after October 1, 2016. Older clients will not display any inline results if a game result is among them.
object.html_description:
Represents a Game.

Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after October 1, 2016. Older clients will not display any inline results if a game result is among them.
object.rst_description:
Represents a `Game <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#games>`_.
**Note:** This will only work in Telegram versions released after October 1, 2016. Older clients will not display any inline results if a game result is among them.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be game
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *game*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: Inline keyboard attached to the message
annotations.name: reply_markup
